mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectDspRevCpst Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ REV_SN , REV_CPST_TURN , USE_YN , DSP_CTGRY_NO , DSP_BRND_CTGRY_NO , DSP_BRND_ID , PROMT_SN , EVT_NO , STRND_SN , PC_MOBILE_TMPLAT_IND_USE_YN , PC_TMPLAT_SN , MOBILE_TMPLAT_SN , PC_PRVW_URL , MOBILE_PRVW_URL , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM DSP_REV_CPST WHERE 1 = 1 AND REV_SN = #{revSn,jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND REV_CPST_TURN = #{revCpstTurn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
